title: I keep crashing ingame, please help! ^.^
body:
Ever since I was forced to change to Windows 10 (I'm not joking, it's so bad that they have to force people to get it) and even when I reverted to Windows 8.1, it still crashes! I've reinstalled league, searched google on it, and some others, and still can't find the fix. If you have any solution, please tell me. Thanks!

Good luck in the rift! :D

replies.body: I'd say 95% of the time complete game crashes are a result of a system error which means that it's usually a process of elimination to figure out what it is.  As a starting point though, I'd recommend checking out our article on [Bug Splats and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) which contains fixes to the most common causes that we've found.  Let me know if it helps!

Does that mean I'd have to reinstall Windows 10? The link mentioned that Windows must be updated. Windows 10 was the reason why League got screwed up on my computer; please clarify.

Thanks so much for helping btw! I didnt know if Rito directly helps the users, but its good to see that they do <3
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RIwk4m90,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-25T19:40:01.447+0000)
>
> No worries dude! We've got your back 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
> 
> You shouldn't have to reinstall Windows 10 just for this, no.  When I say "system error" I really just mean that it's usually a software/driver sort of thing causing a problem.  That's why most of the Bug Splat/Game Crash article has steps relating to making sure you have the latest updates/patches for the most important pieces of software (GPU, Operating System, etc.).    Hopefully this clarifies things a bit!

Sorry for not updating on the situation D';

I found out that the problem was overheating; dust clogged up the fans.

It'd be great if there were a section in that page you linked me, that was about Computer Maintenance; I'm sure it'd help many who were in my situation.
